UML:TaggedValue.value: Every uStore user's login will open secure session
Any user will login to uStore and the password would be saved and transformed using encryption
Any user can not access or change private data of other users. Any user can not change public data of other users.
uStore will not allow non-authorized users to access or change any data that needs permissions to be accessed or changed.
uStore should be able to detect possible attacks like flooding or password guessing, and neutralize them in the best possible way.
When paying for any service by uStore, uStore will use only secured protocols. For example: a VeriSign SSL Certificate
